thread.title: Patriots have perfect practice attendance for third consecutive day | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
thread.title_full: Patriots have perfect practice attendance for third consecutive day | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian | Boston Herald

author: Jeff Howe
title: Patriots have perfect practice attendance for third consecutive day | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
text:
The Patriots were all present and accounted for today for the third consecutive practice.
Cornerback Tarell Brown (foot) and defensive end Trey Flowers (shoulder) had new injuries added to yesterday's practice report, but they were still able to participate during the media portion of the workout.
The Patriots practiced in shorts and shells.
